# subtitle

**Instance Property**

The subtitle for the poster view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subtitle: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A subtitle for a poster view is optional. If it exists, it appears beneath the [doc://com.apple.tvuikit/documentation/TVUIKit/TVPosterView/title].

## Configuring a Poster View

- **image**: The image for the poster view.
- **imageView**: The image view associated with the poster view.
- **title**: The title for the poster view.
